name: Yeehaw Game
description:
A quick Shooter game inspired by Red Dead Redemption's combat mechanics.

The player is able to Crouch, Sprint and Shoot off the Enemies.

You have 5 lives, which can be replenished by grabbing the bottle item.

If you don't save the hostage in 2min. She blows up to pieces.

Slow-Mo Shooting (Dead Man's Eye) can be activated while aiming for faster and more precise shooting.
